resources.string:
Welcome to Taskager!
 
 Please read these Terms & Conditions ("Terms", "Terms and Conditions") carefully before using the Taskager app.
 
 1. Acceptance of Terms
 By accessing or using Taskager, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.
 
 2. Use of the App
 Taskager is provided for your personal, non-commercial use only.
 You agree not to misuse the app or attempt to access it using a method other than the interface and instructions provided.
 
 3. User Data
 Taskager may store information such as your name, email, and tasks.
 We respect your privacy and do not share your data with third parties without your consent.
 
 4. Intellectual Property
 The app and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of the Taskager team.
 
 5. Termination
 We may terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including breach of the Terms.
 
 6. Changes to Terms
 We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time.
 Changes will be effective immediately upon posting.
 
 7. Contact Us
 If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@taskager.com.
 
 By using Taskager, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions.

Your privacy is important to us at Taskager.
 
 1. Information Collection
 We collect personal information such as your name, email, and tasks to provide a personalized experience. No sensitive data is collected without your consent.
 
 2. Data Usage
 Your data is used solely to enhance your experience within the app.
 We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties.
 
 3. Data Security
 We implement standard security measures to protect your data.
 However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.
 
 4. Third-party Services
 Taskager may use third-party services for analytics or notifications.
 These services have their own privacy policies.
 
 5. Changes to Policy
 We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time.
 Any changes will be reflected in this section.
 
 6. Contact Us
 If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@taskager.com.
 
 By using Taskager, you agree to this Privacy Policy.
